name: Samo
description: Pours pale gold with subtle bread aromas, balanced by floral and spicy notes and a touch of lemon zest.

name: Vespero
description: Roasted chestnut, chocolate and raisin. Ruby hue and a hint of noble hops.

name: Grandar
description: Crackery sweetness balanced with hops, floral and herbal notes that finish with a subtle citrus. Step mashed and hopped with nobles.

name: Rein
description: Refreshing smooth malt backbone with fruit notes and floral aroma.

name: Hanno
description: Resinous, douglas fir with citrus and lychee.

name: Double Prismatic
description: Tangerine zest, pineapple, raspberry, and lemongrass.

name: Demeter Gold Wax
description: Aged for 12 months in Abraham Smith Bowman bourbon finishing barrels, previously port. Notes of honeyed malt, black cherry and oak, with a touch of port sweetness.

name: Époque
description: Aged 18 months in oak foeders, and conditioned on tart and Maraschino cherries. Notes of dark fruit, caramel, oak, and cherry, finishes tart and crisp.
